alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Collier County through 445 PM EDT... At 409 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Naples, or near Naples, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Golden Gate Estates, Belle Meade, Naples Manor, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, North Naples, Lely, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd, Quail Creek Estate, Fiddlers Creek and Pelican Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
